text:
Wojciech Pokora (2 October 1934 – 4 February 2018) was a Polish actor. He has made over 40 appearances in movie and television. He starred in the 1986-1987 television series "Zmiennicy" and "Czterdziestolatek" 1970-1974. He was born in Warsaw. He also appeared in "Man – Woman Wanted" and "A Jungle Book of Regulations".
Pokora died on 4 February 2018 in Warsaw of complications from a stroke at the age of 83.
